author: m.kalinin
content: This is the case when CL hasn't been updated yet. And in the worst case there will be a big red alarming message in logs. CL and EL should always exchange with parameter values that they actually have disregarding what settings the counter party has.

author: g11tech
content: ok, so this is just about logging? i assumed incorrectly that CL should terminate if the params mismatch happen

author: m.kalinin
content: Right, it's about logging. The spec states surfacing an error and nothing atop of that
